text: Babcock Street is a station on the MBTA Green Line "B" Branch located in Boston, Massachusetts. The station is located on Commonwealth Avenue at Babcock Street. Babcock Street consists of two side platforms which serve the "B" Branch's two tracks. Babcock street is 24 minutes away from Park Street.Association for Public Transportation, Car-Free in Boston, A Guide for Locals and Visitors, 10th ed. (2003), p. 117. ==References== ==Other websites== *MBTA - Babcock Street * Station from Google Maps Street View Category:Buildings and structures in Boston Category:Railway stations in the United States
title: Babcock Street (MBTA station)
